description: Stylesheet for the Tic Tac Toe frontend application, managing light and dark theme variables and defining styles for various UI components.

classes.name: App
classes.description: Main application container with center-aligned content and responsive design.

classes.name: App-header
classes.description: Header component of the application, designed to hold the logo and title.

classes.name: App-link
classes.description: Link styling within the application for consistent theming.

classes.name: theme-toggle
classes.description: Button for toggling between light and dark themes.
